content: tunisian crochet ear warmer by haley handcrafted materials -1 s kein b ulky 5 y arn i love this chunky yarn in warm blush approx 65 yds -6 5mm c rochet h ook a s traight h ook w ithout handle -tapestry n eedle -scissors gauge and measurements gauge 14 sts x 9 row = 4 square the finished piece measures 10 5 wide x 4 5 tall sewn together gauge is only important for this project if you want to make the piece to these measurements abbreviations chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch st s stitch es note one row in tunisian crochet tc is created in two steps the forward pass and the return pass tunisian crochet ear warmer pattern chain 16 starting in the second chain from hook insert hook into st yarn over and pull up a loop keeping that loop on the hook insert hook into next chain and pull up another loop continue pulling up loops in each chain st across the row now you will start your return pass first chain 1 with the first loop yarn over and pull through two loops yarn over again and pull through another 2 loops repeat to the end of the row next begin the forward pass you will be working this row into the vertical loops of the previous row insert the hook into the second vertical loop from the hook yarn over and pull up a loop keep the loop on the hook and insert the hook into the next vertical loop yarn over pull up a loop repeat until the last st of the row for the last st insert the hook into the two loops at the end of the row yarn over and pull up a loop complete another return pass keep stitching in this fashion forward pass return pass create 51 row for the last row slip_stitch into each vertical loop across the row tie off leaving a long tail for sewing fold the ends of the earwarmer with the right side facing in place the two ends together overlapping sew together this edge making sure to sew through each of the four layers turn the piece right side out enjoy your ear warmer this pattern and images are property of haley herman and haleyhandcrafted please do not reproduce copy or share any part of this pattern you may sell items created using this pattern but must give credit to haleyhandcrafted if you have any questions regarding this pattern please contact me at haleyhandcrafted@gmail com don t forget to follow haleyhancrafted on instagram and tag me in any projects you make i would love to see and share what you make
